response.overview: Can you live a single day without a moment where the world makes you think: “Really?”  Lasse Rimmer can't. Not anymore. And it's the world's own fault. It simply can't be trusted anymore. Now he's touring Denmark with a brand new solo show that answers a whole host of questions.  Where did the Nazis go? Are they really hiding in recycling centers or kennels? Why is it healthy for children to be lied to by their parents? Why is men's sex life more like Lalandia when women's is more like a luxury safari? How does it feel that the last three boyfriends Lasse has had have been the same woman? Is it possible to find a peaceful little corner for yourself in a world where everyone is looking at everyone and everyone seems to want to be looked at? Are these some of the questions that need answers? Are they really?  “Really?” is Lasse Rimmer's sixth solo show.
response.title: Lasse Rimmer - Virkelig?
